prompts: Create a strong fighting-type Pokemon with muscular arms and a determined expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that excels in building strength and uses heavy materials in battles.
Show me a Pokemon that showcases both physical prowess and a sturdy build.
Design a Pokemon with a powerful stance, ready to lift and throw opponents with ease.
I want a Pokemon that embodies resilience and toughness, with vibrant colors and unique features.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon with an impressive physique, using its environment to its advantage.
Make a Pokemon that appears both friendly and fierce, with a robust design and colorful accents.
